usage1: Press the Tap button or the space key to measure BPM.
usage2: Press the Reset button or the R key to reset BPM.
usage3: The dots on the number line represent the BPM calculated from the last two taps. Use them to notice tempo changes.
usage4: Use the + and Ã— buttons to add or remove counters. If multiple counters exist, the last clicked one will be the target for keyboard operations.
usage5: You can change the language and theme from the icon at the top right.
